feed.title: GitHub Rust Monthly Trending
feed.subtitle: Monthly Trending of Rust in GitHub

entry.title: rustdesk/rustdesk
entry.summary: Open source virtual / remote desktop infrastructure for everyone! The open source TeamViewer alternative. Display and control your PC and Android devices.

entry.title: aptos-labs/aptos-core
entry.summary: A layer 1 for everyone!

entry.title: tauri-apps/tauri
entry.summary: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop applications with a web frontend.

entry.title: sunface/rust-course
entry.summary: “连续六年成为全世界最受喜爱的语言，无 GC 也无需手动内存管理、极高的性能和安全性、过程/OO/函数式编程、优秀的包管理、JS 未来基石" — 工作之余的第二语言来试试 Rust 吧。<>拥有全面且深入的讲解、生动贴切的示例、德芙般丝滑的内容，甚至还有JS程序员关注的 WASM 和 Deno 等专题。这可能是目前最用心的 Rust 中文学习教程/书籍

entry.title: 0x192/universal-android-debloater
entry.summary: Cross-platform GUI written in Rust using ADB to debloat non-rooted android devices. Improve your privacy, the security and battery life of your device.

entry.title: uutils/coreutils
entry.summary: Cross-platform Rust rewrite of the GNU coreutils

entry.title: solana-labs/solana
entry.summary: Web-Scale Blockchain for fast, secure, scalable, decentralized apps and marketplaces.

entry.title: datafuselabs/databend
entry.summary: A modern Elasticity and Performance cloud data warehouse, activate your object storage for real-time analytics. https://app.databend.com/

entry.title: pola-rs/polars
entry.summary: Fast multi-threaded DataFrame library in Rust | Python | Node.js

entry.title: copy/v86
entry.summary: x86 virtualization in your browser, recompiling x86 to wasm on the fly

entry.title: rust-lang/rustlings
entry.summary: 🦀 Small exercises to get you used to reading and writing Rust code!

entry.title: tokio-rs/tokio
entry.summary: A runtime for writing reliable asynchronous applications with Rust. Provides I/O, networking, scheduling, timers, ...

entry.title: emilk/egui
entry.summary: egui: an easy-to-use immediate mode GUI in Rust that runs on both web and native

entry.title: ruffle-rs/ruffle
entry.summary: A Flash Player emulator written in Rust

entry.title: singularity-data/risingwave
entry.summary: RisingWave: the next-generation streaming database in the cloud.

entry.title: Qovery/Replibyte
entry.summary: Seed your development database with real data ⚡️

entry.title: rust-lang/rust
entry.summary: Empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software.

entry.title: firecracker-microvm/firecracker
entry.summary: Secure and fast microVMs for serverless computing.

entry.title: bevyengine/bevy
entry.summary: A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

entry.title: FyroxEngine/Fyrox
entry.summary: 3D and 2D game engine written in Rust

entry.title: yewstack/yew
entry.summary: Rust / Wasm framework for building client web apps

entry.title: foundry-rs/foundry
entry.summary: Foundry is a blazing fast, portable and modular toolkit for Ethereum application development written in Rust.

entry.summary: 🐚 An async & dynamic ORM for Rust
